## urlToString() function

Shortcut to convert a URL to a string

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
declare function _urlToString(aURL: URL | string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  aURL | <code>URL &#124; string</code> | the URL |

<b>Returns:</b>

the resulting string
